data.title: All 94 Eddie Murphy Movies (in Order)
data.meta_description: Get ready to reminisce on some classic comedy moments as we take a look at the best Eddie Murphy movies. From his early stand-up days to his iconic film roles, weâ€™ll be counting down the top picksâ€¦

Get ready to reminisce on some classic comedy moments as we take a look at the best Eddie Murphy movies. From his early stand-up days to his iconic film roles, weâ€™ll be counting down the top picks you wonâ€™t want to miss. So, grab your favorite snacks and join us for a hilarious journey through Eddie Murphyâ€™s filmography.

1. 48 Hrs. (1982)

48 Hrs. â€œ (1982) is an action-packed comedy-crime thriller starring Nick Nolte and Eddie Murphy. When a hard-nosed cop (Nolte) is forced to team up with a wise-cracking criminal (Eddie Murphy) temporarily paroled to him, they must race against time to track down a killer.

Featuring fast-paced action sequences, hilarious one-liners, and a star-studded cast, â€œBeverly Hills Copâ€ is a timeless classic that continues to entertain audiences today.
